docs.snippet: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about Friday:...
docs.lead_paragraph: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about Friday:

docs.snippet: After a driver hit a 10-year-old boy, a crowd beat him until he was unconscious, stopping only when a retired nurse intervened. Five young men face charges in the case....
docs.lead_paragraph: After a driver hit a 10-year-old boy, a crowd beat him until he was unconscious, stopping only when a retired nurse intervened. Five young men face charges in the case.
docs.abstract: Severe beating of white driver Steve Utash by African-American crowd in Detroit after he accidentally struck a 10-year-old boy highlights broader, more complicated problem of crime and violence in largely segregated metropolitan area; five young men face charges in beating Utash unconscious; as church and civic leaders condemn attack and some in neighborhood step forward to identify those involved, Detroit begins searching its soul to repair damage.

headline.main: A Driver’s Bloody Run-In With an Angry Detroit
headline.print_headline: A Driver’s Bloody Run-In With an Angry Detroit

docs.snippet: The top United Nations envoy to Somalia warned Tuesday that the U.N. and other foreign diplomats may have to withdraw from the war-ravaged nation if they continue to be attacked....
docs.lead_paragraph: The top United Nations envoy to Somalia warned Tuesday that the U.N. and other foreign diplomats may have to withdraw from the war-ravaged nation if they continue to be attacked.

headline.main: UN Envoy Raises Possibility of Somali Withdrawal
headline.print_headline: UN Envoy Raises Possibility of Somali Withdrawal

docs.snippet: Enrique Penalosa, a jovial economist who made Colombia's congested capital more tolerable when he was mayor in the 1990s, is bringing his urban smarts to the national scene, hoping to persuade voters he will bring peace and prosperity as president...
docs.lead_paragraph: Enrique Penalosa, a jovial economist who made Colombia's congested capital more tolerable when he was mayor in the 1990s, is bringing his urban smarts to the national scene, hoping to persuade voters he will bring peace and prosperity as president.

headline.main: Urban Hero Takes on Establishment in Colombia Presidential Race
headline.print_headline: Urban Hero Takes on Establishment in Colombia Presidential Race

docs.snippet: Surveillance cameras at San Jose International Airport successfully captured the teenager on the tarmac, climbing up the landing gear of a jet. But in the end, the cameras failed because no one noticed the security breach until the plane — a...
docs.lead_paragraph: Surveillance cameras at San Jose International Airport successfully captured the teenager on the tarmac, climbing up the landing gear of a jet. But in the end, the cameras failed because no one noticed the security breach until the plane — and the boy — landed in Hawaii.

headline.main: Teen Stowaway Shows Holes in Vast Airport Security
headline.print_headline: Teen Stowaway Shows Holes in Vast Airport Security

docs.snippet: In Episode 2, curiosity — who has it, and who doesn’t — is a defining characteristic....
docs.abstract: In Episode 2, curiosity — who has it, and who doesn’t — is a defining characteristic.
